title: SG Lux recall sound
body: Is there an mp3 file of Star Guardian Lux's recall music available anywhere? Just wondering because I would like to download it to use on my phone.

replies.body:
Workin' on it....gonna' try to get it added to the Soundcloud page. 

Standby!
;o let us know when you've updated it :3 thanks!
Hi, is there any update on this? I don't think I've seen it yet. Thanks so much!!
